name: Cosmic Journey (patif, aspirew)
description:
Your spaceship had a malfunction during one of your travels! To

fix it, you have to look for the parts scattered all over mysterious planets!

Watch out for malicious bats and slimes!

Control:

Jump - Space

Move - A/D or Left/Right arrow

Action - F

Pause - P

Shoot - control

Creators: 

Rafał Behrendt, Patrycja Frąckiewicz

Used assets:

https://arongranberg.com/astar/features

https://opengameart.org/content/voices-sound-effects-library

https://opengameart.org/content/space-backgrounds-8

https://opengameart.org/content/platformer-art-complete-pack-often-updated
